business_definition: Transaction category record structure containing transaction type and category information (RECLN = 60)
Composite key identifying a unique transaction category, consisting of transaction type code and category code
Transaction type code - two character code identifying the type of transaction
Transaction category code - four digit numeric code identifying the specific category within a transaction type
Transaction category type description - fifty character text description of the transaction category
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
